dublinCore.dc:title: 119 SRES 16 ATS: To constitute the majority party's membership on certain committees for the One Hundred Ninteenth Congress, or until their successors are chosen.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Thune submitted the following resolution; which was considered and agreed to

form.official-title: To constitute the majority party's membership on certain committees for the One Hundred Ninteenth Congress, or until their successors are chosen.

section.text: That the following shall constitute the majority party's membership on the following committees for the One Hundred Ninteenth Congress, or until their successors are chosen:

committee-appointment-paragraph.header: Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry:
committee-appointment-paragraph.text: Mr. Boozman (Chair), Mr. McConnell, Mr. Hoeven, Ms. Ernst, Mrs. Hyde-Smith, Mr. Marshall, Mr. Tuberville, _______, Mr. Grassley, Mr. Thune, Mrs. Fischer, Mr. Moran.

Ms. Collins (Chair), Mr. McConnell, Ms. Murkowski, Mr. Graham, Mr. Moran, Mr. Hoeven, Mr. Boozman, Mrs. Capito, Mr. Kennedy, Mrs. Hyde-Smith, Mr. Hagerty, Mrs. Britt, Mr. Mullin, Mrs. Fisher, Mr. Rounds.
Mr. Wicker (Chair), Mrs. Fischer, Mr. Cotton, Mr. Rounds, Ms. Ernst, Mr. Sullivan, Mr. Cramer, Mr. Scott (FL), Mr. Tuberville, Mr. Mullin, Mr. Budd, Mr. Schmitt, Mr. Banks, Mr. Sheehy.

committee-appointment-paragraph.header: Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs:
committee-appointment-paragraph.text: Mr. Scott (SC) (Chair), Mr. Crapo, Mr. Rounds, Mr. Tillis, Mr. Kennedy, Mr. Hagerty, Ms. Lummis, Mrs. Britt, Mr. Ricketts, Mr. Banks, Mr. Cramer, Mr. Moreno, Mr. McCormick.

committee-appointment-paragraph.header: Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation:
committee-appointment-paragraph.text: Mr. Cruz (Chair), Mr. Thune, Mr. Wicker, Mrs. Fischer, Mr. Moran, Mr. Sullivan, Mrs. Blackburn, Mr. Young, Mr. Budd, Mr. Schmitt, Mr. Curtis, Mr. Moreno, Mr. Sheehy, Mrs. Capito, Ms. Lummis.

committee-appointment-paragraph.header: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources:
committee-appointment-paragraph.text: Mr. Lee (Chair), Mr. Barrasso, Mr. Risch, Mr. Daines, Mr. Cotton, Mr. McCormick, _______, Mr. Cassidy, Mrs. Hyde-Smith, Ms. Murkowski, Mr. Hoeven.

committee-appointment-paragraph.header: Committee on the Environment and Public Works:
committee-appointment-paragraph.text: Mrs. Capito (Chair), Mr. Cramer, Ms. Lummis, Mr. Curtis, Mr. Graham, Mr. Sullivan, Mr. Ricketts, Mr. Wicker, Mr. Boozman, Mr. Moran.
Mr. Crapo (Chair), Mr. Grassley, Mr. Cornyn, Mr. Thune, Mr. Scott (SC), Mr. Cassidy, Mr. Lankford, Mr. Daines, Mr. Young, Mr. Barrasso, Mr. Johnson, Mr. Tillis, Mrs. Blackburn, Mr. Marshall.
Mr. Risch (Chair), Mr. Ricketts, Mr. McCormick, Mr. Daines, Mr. Hagerty, Mr. Barrasso, Mr. Lee, Mr. Paul, Mr. Cruz, Mr. Scott (FL), Mr. Curtis, Mr. Cornyn.

committee-appointment-paragraph.header: Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions:
committee-appointment-paragraph.text: Mr. Cassidy (Chair), Mr. Paul, Ms. Collins, Ms. Murkowski, Mr. Mullin, Mr. Marshall, Mr. Scott (SC), Mr. Hawley, Mr. Tuberville, Mr. Banks, Mr. Crapo, Mrs. Blackburn.

committee-appointment-paragraph.header: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs:
committee-appointment-paragraph.text: Mr. Paul (Chair), Mr. Johnson, Mr. Lankford, Mr. Scott (FL), Mr. Hawley, Mr. Moreno, Ms. Ernst, Mr. Scott (SC).
Mr. Grassley (Chair), Mr. Graham, Mr. Cornyn, Mr. Lee, Mr. Cruz, Mr. Hawley, Mr. Tillis, Mr. Kennedy, Mrs. Blackburn, Mr. Schmitt, Mrs. Britt, Mr. Crapo.
Mr. Cotton (Chair), Mr. Risch, Ms. Collins, Mr. Cornyn, Mr. Moran, Mr. Lankford, Mr. Rounds, Mr. Young, Mr. Rubio.
Mr. Scott (FL) (Chair), Mr. McCormick, _______, Mr. Tuberville, Mr. Johnson, Mr. Crapo, Mr. Scott (SC).
Mr. Graham (Chair), Mr. Grassley, Mr. Crapo, Mr. Johnson, Mr. Marshall, Mr. Cornyn, Mr. Lee, Mr. Kennedy, Mr. Ricketts, Mr. Moreno, Mr. Scott (FL).
Ms. Murkowski (Chair), Mr. Hoeven, Mr. Daines, Mr. Mullin, Mr. Rounds, Mr. Moran.
Mr. Schmitt (Chair), Mr. Cotton, Mr. Budd, Mr. McCormick, Mrs. Blackburn, Mr. Moran.
Mr. McConnell (Chair), Mr. Cruz, Mrs. Capito, Mr. Wicker, Mrs. Fischer, Mrs. Hyde-Smith, Mr. Hagerty, Mrs. Britt, Mr. Boozman.

committee-appointment-paragraph.header: Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship:
committee-appointment-paragraph.text: Ms. Ernst (Chair), Mr. Risch, Mr. Paul, Mr. Scott (SC), Mr. Young, Mr. Hawley, Mr. Budd, Mr. Curtis, _______, Mrs. Blackburn.
Mr. Moran (Chair), Mr. Boozman, Mr. Cassidy, Mr. Tillis, Mr. Sullivan, Mrs. Blackburn, Mr. Cramer, Mr. Tuberville, Mr. Banks, Mr. Sheehy.
Mr. Lankford (Chair), Mr. Risch, Mrs. Fischer.
